blogPost.excerpt: Most businesses don't have enough time or resources to capture the Customer Success Stories that build trust and authority. Our chatbots automatically ask your customers the right questions to generate engaging stories and compelling social proof.
blogPost.body: Most businesses don't have enough time or resources to capture the Customer Success Stories that build trust and authority. Our chatbots automatically ask your customers the right questions to generate engaging stories and compelling social proof.
blogPost.title: Wizu Stories - Collect customer success stories and compelling social proof
blogPost.author: Simon Neve

localize.description: 大多数企业没有足够的时间或资源来捕捉建立信任和权威的客户成功故事。我们的聊天机器人会自动向您的客户提出正确的问题，以生成引人入胜的故事和令人信服的社交证明。
localize.tagline: 收集客户成功案例和令人信服的社会证明

localize.description: 大多數企業沒有足夠的時間或資源來捕捉建立信任和權威的客戶成功故事。我們的聊天機器人會自動向您的客戶提出正確的問題，以生成引人入勝的故事和令人信服的社交證明。
localize.tagline: 收集客戶成功案例和令人信服的社會證明

previous.excerpt: WeHatePasswords is a Google Chrome extension that replaces all password fields with easy to remember pixel art. Gone are the days of remembering complicated passwords. Simply draw to log in. Compatible with password managers.
previous.title: WeHatePasswords 2.0 - You hate passwords. That's where we come in.

localize.description: WeHatePasswords是一款谷歌浏览器扩展，它可以用易于记忆的像素艺术取代所有密码字段。记住复杂密码的日子已经一去不复返了。只需画出密码即可登录。与密码管理器兼容。
localize.tagline: 你讨厌密码 这就是我们的优势所在。

localize.description: WeHatePasswords是一款谷歌瀏覽器擴展，它可以用易於記憶的像素藝術取代所有密碼字段。記住複雜密碼的日子已經一去不復返了。只需畫出密碼即可登錄。與密碼管理器兼容。
localize.tagline: 你討厭密碼 這就是我們的優勢所在。
